title: 13-Year-Old Daredevil Jumps Trash Cans in Alley on “Junker Special” Bike
content:
I donâ€™t think Iâ€™ve ever seen anything that encapsulates the feeling of America in the 1970s more than this local news report about 13-year-old Terry â€œEvel Knievelâ€ Bolinger and his attempt to jump over 10 trash cans on his bike â€œmade from the parts of several other bikesâ€.

At the beginning of the segment, the reporter on the scene says of Bolinger, â€œThere are some youngsters that know what they want to do in life from the time they can talk and walk.â€ And so it appears that his daredevil ways never left him:

Terry Michael â€œSpikeâ€ Bolinger 42, of Indianapolis, lived, loved and died riding his Harley. â€œSpikeâ€ passed away Tuesday, September 6, 2005 in Wishard Hospital. He was born October 7, 1962 in Indianapolis, IN.
